Package com.Software.FitnessSystem.AdminControllers

Class ContentManagementControls

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.AdminControllers.ContentManagementControls
public class ContentManagementControls extends Object
Content Management Controls for handling tips and feedback.
Author:
Muath Hassoun

  • Method Details

    • setApprovedTipsMap

      public static void setApprovedTipsMap(Map<String,Content> approvedTips)
      Sets the map of approved tips.
      Parameters:
      approvedTips - A map of tip IDs to their corresponding Content objects.

    • setHandledFeedbackMap

      public static void setHandledFeedbackMap(Map<String,String> handledFeedback)
      Sets the map of handled feedback.
      Parameters:
      handledFeedback - A map of feedback IDs to their responses.

    • dealWithContentTypes

      public static void dealWithContentTypes(Map<String,Content> tips, boolean isForFeedbacks)
      Deals with content types, either reviewing feedback or approving/rejecting tips.
      Parameters:
      tips - The map of tips or feedback to review.
      isForFeedbacks - True if the content is for feedback, false if for tips.

    • reviewArticleAndTips

      public static boolean reviewArticleAndTips(Map<String,Content> tips)
      Reviews articles and tips to determine if there are any to process.
      Parameters:
      tips - The map of tips to review.
      Returns:
      True if there are tips to review, false if none.

    • accessToPrinter

      public static void accessToPrinter(Map<String,Content> tips)
      Provides access to print the tips.
      Parameters:
      tips - The map of tips to print.

    • approveOrRejectTheTips

      public static boolean approveOrRejectTheTips(Map<String,Content> tips)
      Prompts the user to approve or reject a list of tips based on their IDs.
      Parameters:
      tips - The map of tips to review.
      Returns:
      True if any tips were approved or rejected, false if no action was taken.

    • isApprovedTip

      public static boolean isApprovedTip(String id, Map<String,Content> tips)
      Marks a tip as approved and moves it to the approved tips map.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tip to approve.
      tips - The map of tips to review.

    • isRejectedTip

      public static boolean isRejectedTip(String id, Map<String,Content> tips)
      Marks a tip as rejected and removes it from the tips map.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tip to reject.
      tips - The map of tips to review.

    • respondToFeedback

      public static boolean respondToFeedback(Map<String,Content> tips)
      Prompts the user to handle feedback by responding to a list of feedback IDs.
      Parameters:
      tips - The map of tips (which are feedback in this case) to handle.
      Returns:
      True if feedback was successfully handled, false otherwise.

    • handleSelectFeedback

      public static boolean handleSelectFeedback(String id, Map<String,Content> userFeedbackMap)
      Handles a specific feedback by responding based on its content type and marking it as handled.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the feedback to handle.
      userFeedbackMap - The map of feedback to review.
